snippet.title: New York Nights: Friends for Life [Longplay] Gameloft 2008
snippet.description:
New York Nights: Friends for Life is a 2008 simulation mobile game made by Gameloft. 
The goal of the game is to have a great career by: Running a Corporation, Directing Films, or Starring on Broadway.
I chose to Run a Corporation as career choice. Besides having a good career the goal is to find: friends, love and the "Soul" of New York.
